recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper. Simple, rich, and satisfying.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta until crisp.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan.
Drain pasta and quickly mix with pancetta and egg-cheese mixture.
Serve with extra Parmesan and pepper.

recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy, golden pancakes perfect for a hearty breakfast.
instructions: Whisk together dry ingredients in a bowl.
In another bowl, mix milk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Pour batter on hot greased skillet, cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve with syrup or toppings of choice.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender chicken chunks simmered in a rich and creamy spiced tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or sauté the chicken until browned.
Sauté onion and garlic, add tomato puree and cream.
Add chicken to sauce and simmer until cooked through.
Serve with rice or naan.

recipes.title: French Onion Soup
recipes.description: A savory soup made with caramelized onions, beef broth, and melted cheese on toasted bread.
instructions: Caramelize onions in butter over low heat.
Add thyme and beef broth, simmer for 30 minutes.
Pour soup into bowls, top with bread slices and cheese.
Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: Poached eggs in a spicy tomato and bell pepper sauce, served hot with bread.
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and bell pepper.
Add chopped tomatoes and spices, simmer to thicken.
Make wells in the sauce and crack in the eggs.
Cover and cook until eggs are just set.
Serve with crusty bread.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Spiced ground beef served in crispy taco shells with fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook beef with taco seasoning.
Warm taco shells.
Fill shells with beef and toppings.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Simple and fresh sushi rolls with rice, vegetables, and seafood or tofu.
instructions: Cook and season sushi rice.
Place rice on nori, add fillings.
Roll tightly and slice.
Serve with soy sauce and accompaniments.

recipes.title: Falafel Wrap
recipes.description: Crispy falafel balls wrapped in pita bread with fresh veggies and tahini sauce.
ingredients: Pita bread, lettuce, tomato, tahini sauce
instructions: Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, parsley, spices, and flour.
Form into balls and fry until golden.
Stuff pita with falafel, veggies, and sauce.
Serve fresh.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.description: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with eggs, tofu or shrimp, and a tangy-sweet sauce.
instructions: Soak noodles until soft.
Stir-fry protein and eggs.
Add noodles and sauce ingredients.
Toss with sprouts and serve with peanuts and lime.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: A fresh, crisp salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, onions, and feta cheese.
instructions: Chop vegetables and combine in a bowl.
Add olives and crumbled feta.
Drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, and sprinkle oregano.
Toss and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Pav Bhaji
recipes.description: A spicy mashed vegetable curry served with buttered bread rolls.
instructions: Boil and mash vegetables.
Sauté onion and tomatoes, add masala and mashed vegetables.
Cook until thick.
Toast pav buns with butter.
Serve hot with lemon and onions.
